transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Good afternoon sir, Sujit baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Ha sir abhi aapki ticket open hui thi na, tabhi se mujhe calls aapke paas regular aa rahi thi.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Ha to waha pe na aapka ek number hai 94786 jinse aapka jo purana form hai Balaji Fiber Product wala registered hai na, to waha par kuch changes kiye gaye the, matlab dobara try kiya gaya tha payment pe, click ho gaya hoga galti se, is wajah se waha pe unke paas notification gayi thi that's because unhone call kiya tha aapko, theek hai? Kyunki dono GST alag thi.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai? To abhi maine yaha par update kar diya hai, ab aapka ticket bhi open kar diya hai, to yaha pe abhi aapke paas koi call nahi jayegi aur wo jo purana wala number tha aapka, 94 se starting mein aur last mein 786 hai, wo number hai abhi aapke paas?
Customer: Pura number batayenge?
Executive: Pura number? Pura number, ek minute bata raha hu.

Customer: Hello sir, pura number hai 94, hello aawaz aa rahi hai?
Executive: Haanji haanji.
Customer: Hello. Pura number hai 94167
Executive: Number bata raha hu sir, 94
Customer: Ji sir.
Customer: 16733786
Executive: Haanji sir haanji.
Executive: Theek hai? Is number se aap apni profile login kijiyega aur waha pe na aapke paas disable ka option aayega, three lines pe click karne ke baad, theek hai? Aap waha se disable kar sakte ho apne account.
Customer: Kaha se, kaha se hoga disable?
Executive: Agar aap comfortable hai ek baar aap meeting join kar lijiye to main aapko guide kar du pura sir. Nahi wo number sir actually father ke paas hai to unse karwana padega na wo, to aap mere ko bata dijiye.
Executive: Dekhiye, bata deta hu, jab aap profile pe login karoge na, theek hai?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Apna seller.indiamart.com pe is number se login karna aap, theek hai? Ye number main aapko abhi whatsapp kar dunga current wale number pe, is number se login kijiyega, OTP jayega, theek hai? OTP jaane ke baad upar mein jaha par aapka naam aata hai na, jaise abhi aap dekhoge to aapka naam aa raha hoga, hai na? Gaurav Kajal, waha par aapke father ka aapka naam aayega.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai? Waha pe three dots pe click karne ke baad, three lines aayenge sorry, waha pe do option dikhega, pehla logout, dusra disable.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai? Aur jo active account hota hai waha pe do option aate hai, logout aur logout from all devices.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: To aapko waha par click karke bas waha pe disable kar dena hai account aur kuch nahi karna sir aapko, IndiaMART ki side se already disable ho gaya hai, ab apne side se ek baar kar doge to koi problem nahi hai, kisi ko call nahi jayegi aapke paas. Uske baad, uske baad agar dobara login karenge to Balaji Fiber Product aayega waha pe?
Executive: Nahi ye wo account dusra hai sir.
Customer: Nahi wo main samajh gaya, wo main samajh gaya lekin maine jaise call mein wo second number wahi dala hua hai call mein, sirf call mein.
Executive: Sirf call mein dala hai na aapne, but aapka jo primary number hai, login hamesha primary se hota hai. To aapka jo secondary number hai wo fiber wale mein sorry pulp wale mein primary hai, samajh gaye?
Customer: Theek hai samajh gaya sir. Aur sir ek cheez aur hai jo buyleads aa rahi hai na, haan wo bottle ki aa rahi hai, bottle ki aur plastic tray ki aa rahi hai.
Executive: Ek minute, ek minute dijiye.
Customer: Bottle ki aa rahi hai aur aapne non relevant mark kar diya?
Executive: Sir main har kar deta hu sir non relevant lekin fir bhi bottle ki aati hai aur jaise egg box hai na egg box, to usme aayega plastic requirement plastic ki hai ya ya paper box ki hai.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ek minute sir, main abhi check kar leta hu.
Executive: Dekho sir abhi jo leads aapke paas aa rahi hai, ye aapka aa raha hai egg boxes ka 100 pieces six pieces material hai paper pulp.
Customer: To na dekhiye suniye maine jaise hi buyleads open kiya to aa raha hai non relevant buyleads found, sabse pehle to ye aa raha hai.
Executive: Ye niche rahiye.
Customer: Suniye ab agar main matlab jo meri consumable buyleads hai uske liye agar relevant buyleads hai nahi hai, uske baad egg boxes aa gaye hai.
Executive: Sir ye six ka hai jaise paper pulp ka hai, wo theek hai, abhi aaya hai ek ghante pehle. Theek hai? Uske niche aaya hai, uske niche aaya hai paper egg packaging box ye bhi theek hai, kal parso pichle hafte na mere ko bottle ki aur egg box plastic ki, yaani ki plastic category mein egg box chahiye kisi ko to wo buyleads mere ko show ho rahi hai.
Customer: Bata raha hu.
Executive: Theek hai? Main aapko bata raha hu sir dekhiye, jab is type ki lead aapke paas aaye na, pehla to aap usko not relevant mark kar do, I am not dealing particular category, second uska screenshot aap mujhe whatsapp kar do.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai? Mera number hai na aapke paas primary wala sir? Personal number maine aapko forward kiya tha 7762990177, theek hai? To us number pe aap mujhe usko whatsapp kar diya karein, main uski mapping check karke same time usko remove kar dunga sir, theek hai? To again fir wo jo number hai wo aapke matlab uski jo leads hai wo aapke paas nahi jayegi. Right sir?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Okay aur koi problem sir?
Customer: Nahi sir aur koi problem nahi. Theek hai? To aapke liye iski jo yaha pe mere paas ticket open hui thi, main isko abhi yaha pe close kar sakta hu?
Executive: Ji sir ji sir kar dijiye. Ji to abhi main aap line pe rahoge, ek second ke liye main closer bhejta hu aap usko close kar dijiye kyunki without confirmation wo close nahi hoti sir.
Customer: Theek hai sir bhej dijiye.
Executive: Ek minute line par rahiyega. Mail ID aapke paas hai na abhi?
Customer: Haanji mail ID hai.
Executive: Ha ek minute bas line par rahiyega.

Executive: Aur aapka jo wo product pe discussion ho raha tha sir, jaha tak mujhe yaad hai ek supplier ke sath jo keh rahe the machine available nahi hai, wo kaha tak pahucha aapka?
Customer: Jo bottle ka tha?
Executive: Ha bottle ka mera aapse beech mein ek baar discussion ho raha tha na ki isme kuch issues aa rahe the, bottle generate hua, bana nahi bana, to aap maine kuch supplier ke number diye the, aapka bhi pehle unse discussion chal raha tha.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Aapko yaad hi hoga. Wo mere ko, wo mere ko requirement nahi hai kyunki mere ko pata hai ki wo aane wale do saal mein banna nahi hai, mere ko pata hai sir. Technicality, technicality mere ko pata hai product ki.
Customer: Achha.
Customer: Mera issue sirf ye tha ki jo product available nahi hai usko kyun matlab mere, mere paas wo buyleads kyun aa rahi hai aur wo matlab sach batau ki jo customer ka call mere paas aata hai ya main pick kar leta hu wo direct call bhi kar lete hai na, wo ye bolte hai ki jab product available nahi hai to dalte kyun hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Matlab wo kahin na kahin IndiaMART ki credibility pe bhi question karte hai ya hamari profile pe karenge.
Executive: Dekhiye kya hota hai na main batau aapko. Dekhiye main dekhiye usse jyada lamba nahi jana chahta wo to matlab close ho hi gaya tha kyunki maine unko jab aapne bola na ki product available hai to maine unko direct message kiya, unhone bola ki aane wale ek saal tak abhi to develop nahi hoega.
Executive: Haanji haanji haanji same.
Executive: Main aapke liye aapko update bhi kiya tha, number bhi share kiya tha, to wahi maine socha ek baar confirmation le lu aap se kaha tak pahucha wo concern. Kyunki, kyunki main aapki, aapko bata deta hu knowledge ke liye kyunki India mein koi bhi company usko develop nahi kar rahi hai.
Customer: Ha India mein to nahi hai aur
Customer: Just meri baat sun lijiye ek baar, uske baad sir aap bol lijiyega. India mein koi bhi company usko develop nahi kar rahi hai aur dusri baat sabse matlab Europe level pe Pulpax karke company hai jo usko develop kar rahi hai, unhone prototype develop kar bhi diye hai lekin mass production mein nahi hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: To jab, jab wo develop ho jayega na sir, wo matlab hame pehle pata lagega ki wo develop ho chuka hai, har koi dekhiye aaj ke time mein global market itna ye nahi hai ki wide hai, har koi reach out kar sakta hai usko.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Mera issue sirf ye tha ki product, product available nahi hai, maine isliye to bola mere ko requirement thoda tha 1000 pieces ki. Mere ko requirement nahi hai, maine to agar, agar koi aaj bhi bolta hai na ki hum 1000 piece aapko available karate hai to main, main lene ke liye tayar hu kyunki buyleads aati hai uski aur customer ko requirement hai lekin product available nahi hai. Unhone kya bola mere ko ki product aane wale ek saal mein available nahi hai aur Indian market ke liye nahi hai kyunki uska price 100 se 150 per piece rehne wala hai.
Executive: 100 se 150 per piece rehne wala hai. To Indian market ke liye to available nahi hai jo yaha ka customer chahta hai ki 10 se jyada usko bottle hi na pade kyunki itna, itna 150 ka to usne usme material nahi dalna hai.
Customer: Mehnga hai.
Customer: Pani ke liye chahiye maximum.
Executive: Tab tak possible hi nahi hai. Itna mehnga hai.
Customer: Pani ke liye chahiye.
Executive: Sir, sir pani ke liye chahiye, liquid ke liye, pani ke liye chahiye, 20 ka unka liquid hoga aur wo 150 ki bottle lagayenge?
Executive: Possible hi nahi hai sir, Indian market hi price sensitive hai.
Customer: Haanji to ye hai matlab uske bare mein isliye jaana nahi chahta hu, wo to matlab unhone profile, unhone profile pe lagaya hua hai aur main bol bhi raha hu ki wo customer ko misguide kar rahe hai jab available nahi hai to kyun dala hua hai. Apne views apni matlab buyleads dalne ke liye dala hua hai chalo theek hai. Wo to matlab supplier ka issue hai lekin.
Executive: Koi baat nahi hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai koi baat nahi hai, aap ek baar apna mail check out kijiyega sir maine aapko ticket closer bheja hai, aap isko ek baar close kar dijiye. Primary mail check out kijiyega ek baar.
Customer: Isme aaya hua hai request.
Executive: Mere naam se koi mail aayi hai aapke paas ya fir external ticket karke kuch?
Customer: IndiaMART.com a ticket has been open for your request.
Executive: Nahi nahi wo to dusra hai ek minute ek minute rukiye.
Executive: Ek second dijiyega.

Executive: Ek baar check kijiye sir abhi aaya hoga.
Customer: Aa gaya? Main check kar raha hu.
Executive: Ha mail check kijiye.
Customer: Ji aa gaya. Satisfied? Waha pe, ha satisfied aur kuch bhi aap feedback de sakte ho, okay good jo bhi aapko lagta hai aap wo deke submit kar dijiye to main yaha se closer le lu sir.
Customer: Ho gaya ho gaya okay. Thank you for your confirmation sir, koi bhi issue hoti hai aap buyleads se connect kar sakte ho.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Theek hai? Okay okay thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to disable old Balaji Fiber Product account.

- Receiving irrelevant buyleads (bottles, plastic trays).

- Questions why unavailable products are listed.



Resolution:

- Executive updated and opened a ticket.

- Provided steps to disable the old account.

- Advised to mark irrelevant leads and send screenshots.

- Will remove irrelevant leads upon receiving screenshots.

- Sent ticket closure mail for confirmation.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to close the ticket.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- account disable, irrelevant buyleads, product availability
